AT.name: Gardening Mama: Forest Friends
AT.description: In diesem farbenfrohen Spiel für Nintendo 3DS und 2DS können die Spieler wunderschöne Blumen, leckeres Obst und schmackhaftes Gemüse in ihrem eigenen Garten anbauen, hegen, pflegen und ernten. Sie können die Feldfrüchte und Blumen an lokale Händler ausliefern, um deren Geschäft anzukurbeln, und ihren Garten mit über 100 Gegenständen dekorieren.

movies.name: Gardening Mama: Forest Friends: Trailer zum Verkaufsstart

AU.name: Gardening Mama: Forest Friends
AU.description: In this colourful game for Nintendo 3DS and 2DS, players have to plant, water and harvest beautiful flowers and tasty fruit and veg in their very own garden! Players can deliver crops and flowers to local shops to help them expand their business, and decorate their garden with over 100 decorations!

BG.name: Gardening Mama: Forest Friends
BG.description: In this colourful game for Nintendo 3DS and 2DS, players have to plant, water and harvest beautiful flowers and tasty fruit and veg in their very own garden! Players can deliver crops and flowers to local shops to help them expand their business, and decorate their garden with over 100 decorations!

BE.name: Gardening Mama: Forest Friends
BE.description: Dans ce jeu haut en couleurs pour Nintendo 3DS et 2DS, les joueurs sont invités à planter, à arroser et à soigner des fleurs magnifiques, des fruits et légumes frais dans leur propre jardin ! Les joueurs peuvent livrer des plantes et des fleurs dans les boutiques locales pour élargir leur activité et ils peuvent même décorer leur jardin avec plus de cent décorations !

movies.name: Gardening Mama: Forest Friends : bande-annonce de lancement

ES.name: Gardening Mama: Forest Friends
ES.description: En este colorido juego para Nintendo 3DS y 2DS, el jugador planta, riega y cosecha hermosas flores y deliciosas frutas y vegetales en su propio jardín. A continuación lleva la cosecha y las flores a las tiendas locales para ayudarlas a expandir su negocio, y decora su jardín con más de 100 artículos.

movies.name: Gardening Mama: Forest Friends: Tráiler de lanzamiento

IT.name: Gardening Mama: Forest Friends
IT.description: In questo colorato gioco per Nintendo 3DS e 2DS, i giocatori devono piantare annaffiare, e raccogliere bellissimi fiori e gustosa frutta e verdura nel loro giardino personale! I giocatori possono consegnare i frutti del loro raccolto ai negozi della zona per aiutarli ad ingrandire il loro business, e decorare il proprio giardino con oltre 100 decorazioni diverse!

movies.name: Gardening Mama: Forest Friends: trailer di lancio

movies.name: Gardening Mama: Forest Friends: Launch Trailer

NL.name: Gardening Mama: Forest Friends
NL.description: In deze kleurrijke game voor de Nintendo 2DS en 3DS kunnen spelers prachtige bloemen en lekkere groenten en fruit in hun eigen tuin planten, water geven en oogsten! Spelers kunnen hun oogst en bloemen aan lokale winkels verkopen, om deze bedrijven te laten floreren. Ook kunnen spelers hun tuin versieren met meer dan 100 decoraties!

movies.name: Gardening Mama: Forest Friends: Introductietrailer

NZ.name: Gardening Mama: Forest Friends
NZ.description: In this colourful game for Nintendo 3DS and 2DS, players have to plant, water and harvest beautiful flowers and tasty fruit and veg in their very own garden! Players can deliver crops and flowers to local shops to help them expand their business, and decorate their garden with over 100 decorations!

PL.name: Gardening Mama: Forest Friends
PL.description: In this colourful game for Nintendo 3DS and 2DS, players have to plant, water and harvest beautiful flowers and tasty fruit and veg in their very own garden! Players can deliver crops and flowers to local shops to help them expand their business, and decorate their garden with over 100 decorations!

movies.name: Gardening Mama: Forest Friends: Launch Trailer

PT.name: Gardening Mama: Forest Friends
PT.description: Neste colorido jogo para a Nintendo 3DS e 2DS os jogadores têm de plantar, regar e colher flores, assim como plantas, legumes e frutos, no seu próprio jardim. Os jogadores podem entregar produtos nas lojas locais para ajudá-los a expandir o seu negócio e decorar o seu jardim com mais de 100 itens!

movies.name: Gardening Mama: Forest Friends: Trailer de lançamento

RU.name: Gardening Mama: Forest Friends
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. В этой яркой игре для Nintendo 3DS and 2DS игроки сажают, поливают и выращивают прекрасные цветы, а также сочные фрукты в собственном саду! Игроки могут доставлять свой урожай в местные магазинчики, а затем приобрести более 100 украшений для своего сада!

movies.name: Gardening Mama: Forest Friends: трейлер к выходу игры
